sys_security_acl.description: Deny create for all fields in x_1305322_raas_m2m_actor_media if the record matches the criteria (x_1305322_raas_media.state=3^EQ), unless users have the role admin, and the ACL condition (x_1305322_raas_media.state=3^EQ) evaluates to true.
